caller_intent: Matthew from NewRes is confirming whether NewRes LLC is listed as a mortgagee on Francisco Flores' policy and ensuring coverage for a second mortgage. He also requests a binder and replacement cost estimate.
resolution_steps: Brandy confirms the policy number and customer name.
Verifies mortgagee clause details (NewRes LLC address and loan number).
Agrees to fax proof of insurance to the provided fax number.
Offers to send a binder immediately and confirm replacement cost basis.
Confirms policy is paid in full and dwelling limit details.
knowledge_required: Understanding mortgagee clauses and policy documentation
Handling binders and replacement cost estimates
summary: Brandy from Alliance Insurance Services confirms NewRes LLC's mortgagee status on Francisco Flores' policy, arranges to fax proof of insurance, and agrees to send a binder with replacement cost details. The call concludes with confirmation of policy status and next steps for document delivery.
